name: Card TD
description:
Coming Soon! 

A Tower Defense game, where you play cards to build and improve your towers. The Demo comes with several levels, and one character. The full game will feature better balancing, increased level counts, and significantly more character/card selection options! Can you beat every level? 

Feel free to download and try out the alpha demo now! 

We would love to have your constructive feedback!

Known Bugs/Issues: 

  • Towers do not have a way to show you their range before you build them, nor after. At the moment, most towers, EXCEPT the level 1 mage, can hit enemies from 2 tiles away, the higher the level, the greater the range. The Level 3 Archer, has the greatest range, and can pretty much hit the road from any build location. 
  • The highlighter for the towers when upgrade cards are used, is possibly bugged.
  • The MAC version seems unable to be ran by current tests, however if you are able to get it running, do let us know.
  • Sift and Scattered Thoughts seem to have exploitable interactions when canceled.
  • Sometimes, the first wave will never spawn, the timer will count down from 10, reach 0, then go back to 10. Currently, the programmer is working on a fix, for now, please just exit the game completely, and restart. It does not appear to be an issue beyond level 1, but we'll keep an eye on it. 

Current Version Patches: 

  • Enemies now correctly spawn in the later levels
  • Wave 11 Win screen works correctly now.
